activities:
DataBank is a managed collocation provider and operates a single colocation facilty in Dallas, TX. We do not process personal information of our co-location customers. We do provide services for hosting and other companies who may do this. We do however provide physical security for data center access.
DataBank Holdings also processes employee data for HR purposes.
personaldata: off-line: Human resource data, employee data.
recoursemech:
Consumer or DataBank employee complaints will generally be escalated internally to the DataBank corporate legal department which will consult 
with management on appropriate response or action depending on the facts at issue. In the event that DataBank is unable to resolve a complaint to the consumer or employee''''s satisfaction, DataBank will direct the employee or consumer to contact local authoritative bodies (including the European Data Protection Authorities).
